name: developer-roadmap-plugin
description: Comprehensive learning system for 7 specialized developer roles: Frontend, Backend, DevOps, Data Science, Full Stack, Cloud Engineering, and AI Engineering. Based on roadmap.sh with 1000+ hours of structured content.
author: Developer Roadmap Community

agents.name: Frontend Developer
agents.description: Master modern frontend development with React, Vue, Angular, and essential web technologies

agents.name: Backend Developer
agents.description: Build robust backend systems with databases, APIs, and cloud technologies

agents.name: DevOps Engineer
agents.description: Master infrastructure automation, CI/CD, and cloud deployment strategies

agents.name: Data Scientist
agents.description: Learn machine learning, statistics, and data analysis for insights and predictions

agents.name: Full Stack Developer
agents.description: Become proficient in both frontend and backend development for complete web applications

agents.name: Cloud & Infrastructure Engineer
agents.description: Design and manage cloud infrastructure with AWS, Azure, and GCP

agents.name: AI Engineer
agents.description: Master artificial intelligence, LLMs, generative AI, and AI agents

skills.name: Web Fundamentals
skills.description: Internet, HTTP, DNS, browsers, and core web concepts

skills.name: Frontend Core
skills.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design

skills.name: Frontend Frameworks
skills.description: React, Vue.js, Angular, and modern framework patterns

skills.name: Backend Languages & Frameworks
skills.description: Python, Node.js, Java, Go, and web frameworks

skills.name: Database Management
skills.description: SQL, NoSQL, database design, and optimization

skills.name: API Development
skills.description: REST, GraphQL, authentication, and API design patterns

skills.name: Web Security & Best Practices
skills.description: Authentication, authorization, HTTPS, OWASP, and secure coding

skills.name: Linux & System Administration
skills.description: Linux fundamentals, shell scripting, and system management

skills.name: Containerization & Orchestration
skills.description: Docker, Kubernetes, container security, and orchestration patterns

skills.name: Infrastructure as Code
skills.description: Terraform, Ansible, CloudFormation, and IaC best practices

skills.name: CI/CD & Automation
skills.description: Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, and pipeline design

skills.name: Cloud Platforms
skills.description: AWS, Azure, GCP services and cloud architecture

skills.name: Monitoring & Observability
skills.description: Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, logging, and alerting

skills.name: Version Control & Git
skills.description: Git workflows, branching, collaboration, and best practices

skills.name: Testing & Quality Assurance
skills.description: Unit, integration, E2E testing, and test-driven development

skills.name: Data Engineering
skills.description: Data pipelines, ETL, databases, and data warehousing

skills.name: Python & Machine Learning
skills.description: Python programming, NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, and ML fundamentals

skills.name: Deep Learning & Neural Networks
skills.description: TensorFlow, PyTorch, CNNs, RNNs, transformers

skills.name: LLMs & Generative AI
skills.description: Large Language Models, prompt engineering, RAG systems, AI agents

skills.name: AI Agents & Orchestration
skills.description: Agent architectures, multi-agent systems, tools, and memory management

skills.name: MLOps & Model Deployment
skills.description: Model versioning, experiment tracking, deployment, and monitoring

skills.name: Performance Optimization
skills.description: Web performance, database optimization, caching, and scalability

skills.name: DevOps & SRE Practices
skills.description: Deployment strategies, reliability engineering, incident management

skills.name: Statistics & Mathematics
skills.description: Linear algebra, calculus, probability, and statistical analysis

skills.name: Career & Professional Development
skills.description: Portfolio building, interviews, job search, and continuous learning

commands.name: /start-learning
commands.description: Begin your learning journey by choosing a role or skill

commands.name: /choose-role
commands.description: Select a specific developer role to focus on

commands.name: /roadmap-status
commands.description: Check your progress on your selected learning path

commands.name: /skill-deep-dive
commands.description: Get detailed guidance on a specific skill or topic

commands.name: /project-ideas
commands.description: Get hands-on project ideas for your current skill level

commands.name: /interview-prep
commands.description: Prepare for technical interviews for your target role

commands.name: /assessment
commands.description: Evaluate your current knowledge and find gaps
